column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Tonight we experienced GREAT customer service from Lenny
column2: one of the managers at Lou Malnati's.  We accidentally were sent a pizza with green peppers.  Since neither one of us cares for green peppers
column3: I was disappointed and called the restaurant.  Lenny was very understanding and offered to send a pizza back to us with a rush order.  It was our anniversary (hence why we ordered such a special meal) and Lenny was so sweet to send over cookies and ice cream with the pizza!  The second pizza was absolutely perfect
column4: and the chocolate chip cookies were to die for!
